about.title: About Me
about.bio: Full Stack Engineer with 5+ years of experience in DevOps, Data Engineering, and Web Development.

about.bio_paragraph_1: with 3-5 years of experience building end-to-end solutions. Currently at RHI Magnesita, working across the entire stack‚Äîfrom frontend interfaces to backend systems and cloud infrastructure.
about.bio_paragraph_2: I hold a BSc in Computer Science from PUC Minas, with postgraduate studies in Information Security (UTFPR) and Digital Forensics (IPOG). My work spans OutSystems, JavaScript, C#, Python, and modern DevOps practices.
about.bio_paragraph_3_end: (sworn translator) for Portuguese and English, a side of my varied interests that keeps me connected to language and communication.
about.bio_paragraph_4: When not coding, you'll find me reading (280+ books and counting), researching, or exploring whatever topic catches my curiosity.

projects.title: Code Projects
projects.project_1_desc: Research project analyzing political attitude networks in Brazil using ResIN methodology. Published research with UTFPR/UNIGOU.
projects.project_2_desc: BSc Thesis at PUC/MG exploring network effects of firehosing disinformation tactics.
projects.project_3_desc: Azure DevOps Nanodegree projects including Terraform, IaC, CI/CD pipelines, and testing.
projects.project_4_desc: Flask web application with complete Azure CI/CD pipeline implementation.
projects.project_5_desc: Data engineering project implementing ETL pipeline with PostgreSQL for music streaming analytics.
projects.project_6_desc: NoSQL data modeling project using Apache Cassandra for music streaming data.
projects.project_7_desc: Cloud data warehousing solution using Amazon Redshift for analytics workloads.
projects.project_8_desc: Big data processing with Apache Spark on AWS for scalable data lake architecture.
projects.project_9_desc: Orchestrated data pipelines using Apache Airflow for automated ETL workflows.

research.title: Research
research.paper_1_desc: Research analyzing political attitude networks in Brazil using the ResIN methodology, exploring polarization patterns and network dynamics in Brazilian politics.
research.paper_1_tags: Network Science, Political Science, Data Analysis
research.paper_2_desc: Bachelor's thesis exploring the network effects of firehosing disinformation tactics and their propagation patterns in social networks.
